key.name: imperial-regions
key.summary: Use imerial units in these regions.
key.description: This list contains the regions where imerial units will be used.

key.name: location
key.summary: Override geolocation with latitude and longitude.
key.description: You can override the geolocation with custom latitude and longitude coordinates.

key.name: show-weeks
key.description: If this is set to true, week numbers will be shown in the calendar.
